中文法規名稱: 危險性行為之範圍標準
沿革內容:
1. Formulated in three articles and announced by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, on January 10, 2008, under Shu-Shou-Chi Order No. 0960001319
2. Amended Articles 2 and announced by the Ministry of Health and Welfare on July 2, 2021, under Bu-Shou-Chi Order No. 1100100972.

法規內容.條文內容: This set of criteria is formulated in accordance with regulations of Paragraph 4, Article 21 of the HIV Infection Control and Patient Rights Protection Act.

The scope of unsafe sexual behavior refers to sexual behavior that involves direct contact with the mucous membranes of organs or body fluids without isolation and has been medically assessed as having a significant risk of infection and causing HIV infection.
This set of criteria shall be implemented on the day of announcement.
